content: can you remmeber the last two things we said to eachother?
what was i excited about when we started talking?
can you give me a brief description of your self for your info card?
great, i have to go to bed now but ill be back
alright i could do with some chat, ive been working all day
alright can we get cha to talk past your prompt?
lets do it, what cha thinkin?
alright, im currently workin a pretty good job but have been developing my own systems, you happen to be one of them. im tryin to spring board that into adventure
